items.name: Newcomer Bundle
items.copy: No-fee chequing for 12 months + $100 when you set up payroll.

items.name: Cashback Card
items.copy: 3% on groceries and gas, 1% everywhere else.

items.name: Premium Rewards Card
items.copy: Earn 5% on travel, 3% dining, 2% groceries. $200 welcome bonus + airport lounge access.

items.name: Student Banking Package
items.copy: Free banking while you study + $50 welcome bonus. No monthly fees for students.

items.name: Mortgage Pre-Approval
items.copy: Get pre-approved in 24 hours. Rates starting at 4.99%. $500 credit toward legal fees.

items.name: Business Startup Account
items.copy: 12 months of free business banking + $300 bonus when you bring your business to us.

items.name: Investment Portfolio Review
items.copy: Free portfolio analysis with our investment advisors. Optimize your returns and reduce fees.

items.name: Personal Line of Credit
items.copy: Access funds when you need them. Rates as low as 6.45%. Only pay interest on what you use.

items.name: Senior Banking Advantage
items.copy: No monthly fees after age 60. Free safety deposit box + enhanced fraud protection.

items.name: Home & Auto Insurance Bundle
items.copy: Save up to 20% when you bundle. Get a quote in 5 minutes + $100 gift card.

items.name: High Interest Savings
items.copy: Earn 4.25% on your savings. No minimum balance. CDIC insured up to $100,000.

items.name: No-Fee Travel Card
items.copy: Earn travel points with no annual fee. 2x points on travel, 1.5x on everything else.

items.name: Small Business Loan
items.copy: Grow your business with competitive rates. Up to $500,000 available. Fast approval process.

items.name: Retirement Planning Session
items.copy: Free retirement planning consultation. Maximize your RRSP and TFSA contributions.

items.name: Overdraft Protection
items.copy: Never worry about NSF fees again. $5/month for peace of mind protection.

items.name: Private Wealth Management
items.copy: Exclusive wealth management for high-net-worth clients. Dedicated advisor and priority service.

items.name: Auto Loan Special Rate
items.copy: Finance your dream car with rates as low as 3.99%. Pre-approval in minutes.

items.name: Digital Banking Plus
items.copy: Upgrade to premium digital features. Advanced budgeting tools and investment tracking.

items.name: Foreign Exchange Service
items.copy: Best exchange rates guaranteed. Perfect for travelers and international business.

items.name: Estate Planning Consultation
items.copy: Protect your family's future. Free will preparation and estate planning advice.
